message_1: Using Predicate logic, write the negation of the statement "All even numbers are divisible by 4".
message_2:
Let E(x) represent "x is an even number" and D(x) represent "x is divisible by 4". The original statement can be written as:

∀x (E(x) → D(x))

The negation of the statement is:

∃x (E(x) ∧ ¬D(x))

This means "There exists an even number x that is not divisible by 4".
